en.lang_these_page_describe_all_blogs_that_: These page describe all blogs that was written by doctor. Also if you are doctor or health provider you can add blog/ post /suggestion here. Keep in mind that this blog must be help related.
en.lang_you_can_see_your_previous_post_also: You can see your previous post also by clicking on my post button.
en.lang_if_you_are_a_general_public_or_a_pa: if you are a general public or a patient you can only read and see all blogs.
en.lang_using_'browse_tags'_you_can_filter_: using 'browse tags' you can filter your desired post according to the tag.
en.lang_you_have_to_login_as_doctor_to_post: You have to login as Doctor to post anything
